Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class contains information about Players who are playing a match, including a unique ID, nickname, the color of the chosen workers, a reference to two different workers the player can play with, a reference to the God associated to the player, the match in which the player is involved in and a boolean that indicates it the player is who chooses the Gods in play.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String id, Model model, Match match)
      This is the builder of the class. When a Player is created its id, nickname and the match he is enrolled in are set.
      Parameters:
      id - the String random identifier for this Player.
      model - the Model corresponding to this Player instance.
      match - the Match that this Player is about to play.

  • Method Details

    • getColor

      public PrintableColor getColor()
      This getter method gives information about the color the player has chosen for its workers.
      Returns:
      the chosen color of worker, it returns null if the color has not been set yet

    • setColor

      public void setColor​(PrintableColor color)
      This setter method allows players to set the color of their workers.
      Parameters:
      color - is the String that indicates the color chosen from a Player at the beginning of the match

    • isGodChooser

      public boolean isGodChooser()
      Determines if this Player is the GodChooser for its match, or not.
      Returns:
      true if the Player is the GodChooser, false otherwise.

    • setAsGodChooser

      public void setAsGodChooser()
      GodChooser property setter

    • getWorkerFirst

      public Worker getWorkerFirst()
      This getter method returns a reference to the first worker the player has chosen.
      Returns:
      the first worker associated to the player, it returns null if the worker has not been set yet

    • getWorkerSecond

      public Worker getWorkerSecond()
      This getter method returns a reference to the second worker the player has chosen.
      Returns:
      the second worker associated to the player, it returns null if the worker has not been set yet

    • getGodStrategy

      public GodStrategy getGodStrategy()
      This getter method returns a reference to the GodStrategy the player has chosen.
      Returns:
      the GodStrategy associated to the player, it returns null if the God has not been set yet

    • setGodStrategy

      public void setGodStrategy​(GodStrategy godStrategy)
      This setter method allows players to set the GodStrategy associated to them.
      Parameters:
      godStrategy - is the God chosen from a Player at the beginning of the match

    • getNickname

      public java.lang.String getNickname()
      Player's nickname getter
      Returns:
      the Player's nickname

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Player's nickname setter
      Parameters:
      nickname - the new Player's nickname to be set

    • getPlayerID

      public java.lang.String getPlayerID()
      Player's ID getter
      Returns:
      the Player ID, which identifies a player in a match

    • getMatch

      public Match getMatch()
      Player's Match getter
      Returns:
      the Match that this Player is playing

    • getModel

      public Model getModel()
      Player's Match Model getter
      Returns:
      the Model instance of the Match that this Player is playing
